segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 3
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 3

segments.pli: 3. Puggalavagga
segments.en: 3. Persons

segments.pli: 21. Samiddhasutta
segments.en: 21. With Saviṭṭha

segments.pli: Evaṃ me sutaṃ—
segments.en: So I have heard.

segments.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu.
segments.en: Then Venerable Saviṭṭha and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita went up to Venerable Sāriputta, and exchanged greetings with him.

segments.pli: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ samiddhaṃ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
segments.en: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, they sat down to one side and Venerable Sāriputta said to Venerable Saviṭṭha,

segments.pli: “Tayome, āvuso samiddha, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend Saviṭṭha, these three people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Katame tayo?
segments.en: What three?

segments.pli: Kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto.
segments.en: The personal witness, the one attained to view, and the one freed by faith.

segments.pli: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: These are the three people found in the world.

segments.pli: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
segments.en: Of these three people, who do you believe to be the finest?”

segments.pli: “Tayome, āvuso sāriputta, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend Sāriputta, these three people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Katame tayo?
segments.en: What three?

segments.pli: Kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto.
segments.en: The personal witness, the one attained to view, and the one freed by faith.

segments.pli: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: These are the three people found in the world.

segments.pli: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto, ayaṃ me puggalo khamati imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
segments.en: Of these three people, I believe the person freed by faith to be finest.

segments.pli: Taṃ kissa hetu?
segments.en: Why is that?

segments.pli: Imassa, āvuso, puggalassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattan”ti.
segments.en: Because this person’s faculty of faith is outstanding.”

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Sāriputta said to Mahākoṭṭhita,

segments.pli: “tayome, āvuso koṭṭhika, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend Koṭṭhika, these three people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Katame tayo?
segments.en: What three?

segments.pli: Kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto.
segments.en: The personal witness, the one attained to view, and the one freed by faith.

segments.pli: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: These are the three people found in the world.

segments.en: Of these three people, who do you believe to be the finest?”

segments.en: “Reverend Sāriputta, these three people are found in the world.

segments.en: What three?

segments.pli: Kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto.
segments.en: The personal witness, the one attained to view, and the one freed by faith.

segments.pli: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: These are the three people found in the world.

segments.pli: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo kāyasakkhī, ayaṃ me puggalo khamati imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
segments.en: Of these three people, I believe the personal witness to be finest.

segments.pli: Taṃ kissa hetu?
segments.en: Why is that?

segments.pli: Imassa, āvuso, puggalassa samādhindriyaṃ adhimattan”ti.
segments.en: Because this person’s faculty of immersion is outstanding.”

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Mahākoṭṭhita said to Sāriputta,

segments.pli: “tayome, āvuso sāriputta, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend Sāriputta, these three people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Katame tayo?
segments.en: What three?

segments.pli: Kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto.
segments.en: The personal witness, the one attained to view, and the one freed by faith.

segments.pli: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: These are the three people found in the world.

segments.pli: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
segments.en: Of these three people, who do you believe to be the finest?”

segments.pli: “Tayome, āvuso koṭṭhika, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend Koṭṭhika, these three people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Katame tayo?
segments.en: What three?

segments.pli: Kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto.
segments.en: The personal witness, the one attained to view, and the one freed by faith.

segments.pli: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: These are the three people found in the world.

segments.pli: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo diṭṭhippatto, ayaṃ me puggalo khamati imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
segments.en: Of these three people, I believe the person attained to view to be finest.

segments.pli: Taṃ kissa hetu?
segments.en: Why is that?

segments.pli: Imassa, āvuso, puggalassa paññindriyaṃ adhimattan”ti.
segments.en: Because this person’s faculty of wisdom is outstanding.”

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantañca samiddhaṃ āyasmantañca mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Sāriputta said to Saviṭṭha and Mahākoṭṭhita,

segments.pli: “byākataṃ kho, āvuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ.
segments.en: “Each of us has spoken from the heart.

segments.pli: Āyāmāvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocessāma.
segments.en: Come, reverends, let’s go to the Buddha, and tell him about this.

segments.pli: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā”ti.
segments.en: As he answers, so we’ll remember it.”

segments.pli: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
segments.en: “Yes, reverend,” they replied.

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
segments.en: Then Sāriputta, Saviṭṭha, and Mahākoṭṭhita went up to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side.

segments.pli: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto yāvatako ahosi āyasmatā ca samiddhena āyasmatā ca mahākoṭṭhikena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
segments.en: Then Sāriputta told the Buddha of all they had discussed.

segments.pli: “Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṃ ekaṃsena byākātuṃ:
segments.en: “In this matter, Sāriputta, it’s not easy to definitively declare that

segments.pli: ‘ayaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
segments.en: one of these three people is finest.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañhetaṃ, sāriputta, vijjati yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno, yvāyaṃ puggalo kāyasakkhī svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā, yo cāyaṃ puggalo diṭṭhippatto sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
segments.en: In some cases, a person who is freed by faith is practicing for perfection, while the personal witness and the one attained to view are once-returners or non-returners.

segments.pli: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṃ ekaṃsena byākātuṃ:
segments.en: In this matter, it’s not easy to definitively declare that

segments.pli: ‘ayaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
segments.en: one of these three people is finest.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañhetaṃ, sāriputta, vijjati yvāyaṃ puggalo kāyasakkhī svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno, yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā, yo cāyaṃ puggalo diṭṭhippatto sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
segments.en: In some cases, a personal witness is practicing for perfection, while the one freed by faith and the one attained to view are once-returners or non-returners.

segments.pli: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṃ ekaṃsena byākātuṃ:
segments.en: In this matter, it’s not easy to definitively declare that

segments.pli: ‘ayaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
segments.en: one of these three people is finest.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañhetaṃ, sāriputta, vijjati yvāyaṃ puggalo diṭṭhippatto svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno, yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā, yo cāyaṃ puggalo kāyasakkhī sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
segments.en: In some cases, one attained to view is practicing for perfection, while the one freed by faith and the personal witness are once-returners or non-returners.

segments.pli: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṃ ekaṃsena byākātuṃ:
segments.en: In this matter, it’s not easy to definitively declare that

segments.pli: ‘ayaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’”ti.
segments.en: one of these three people is finest.”

segments.pli: Paṭhamaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Of various individuals on the path, which is best?
